comment:
* Class for managing an app's permission to access a particular {@link android.net.Uri}.
 *
 * @hide

methods.name: public void clearGrantedUriPermissions(String packageName)
methods.comment:
* Permits an application to clear the persistent URI permissions granted to another. * *

Typically called by Settings, requires {@code CLEAR_APP_GRANTED_URI_PERMISSIONS}. * * @param packageName application to clear its granted permissions * * @hide

methods.name: public ParceledListSlice<GrantedUriPermission> getGrantedUriPermissions(@Nullable String packageName)
methods.comment:
* Permits an application to get the persistent URI permissions granted to another. * *

Typically called by Settings or DocumentsUI, requires * {@code GET_APP_GRANTED_URI_PERMISSIONS}. * * @param packageName application to look for the granted permissions, or {@code null} to get * granted permissions for all applications * @return list of granted URI permissions * * @hide
